subject: Re: Flock intros
body:
You don't often get email from david.johnson@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Captain, 

Interesting that they haven't been able to get a hold of me.

I will reach out to Captain Mann today to get this squared away.

Thank you for the heads up!

Thanks
 <https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/open/0c2a714b-6611-4711-9811-59a822e0913e.gif> 

On Thu, Jan 30, 2025 at 8:52?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Have you been in contact with Lane County Sheriff�s Office?  They said they have haven�t been able to get a hold of you and they have the funding to be able to get 15-20 cameras.

	 

	DJ Mann

	Captain at LCSO

	541-682-6527

	dj.mann@lanecountyor.gov dj.mann@lanecountyor.gov 

	 

	Thank you,
	Derek

	 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road

	Eugene, OR 97401

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192

	 

	From: David Johnson <david.johnson@flocksafety.com david.johnson@flocksafety.com > 
	Sent: Thursday, January 23, 2025 12:27 PM
	To: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com >
	Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; Randy Zobel <randy.zobel@flocksafety.com randy.zobel@flocksafety.com >
	Subject: Re: Flock intros

	 

	You don't often get email from david.johnson@flocksafety.com david.johnson@flocksafety.com . Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  

	

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	Detective DeWitt, 

	
	It was nice meeting you the other week.
	
	Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions.
	
	Thanks 

	 

	On Wed, Jan 22, 2025 at 8:22?PM Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com > wrote:

		Hi Detective DeWitt, 

		 

		Introducing you to...

		 

		Randy Zobel - Commercial Sales

		David Johnson - Territory Sales Manager, Oregon 

		 

		Randy and David - our wonderful partners at Eugene PD wanted to get your contact info to pass along to other LE agencies and businesses who are interested in partnering with Flock too. Thanks all!

	
 

Caroline Fraher
Territory Sales Manager

	--
